column2: Have you installed a QR code reader?
column3: How many smart mobile devices do you own (ie. phones, tablets)?
column4: How many years old is your oldest smart device?
column5: How many years old is your newest smart device?
column6: How many quick response (QR) codes do you scan each week?
column7: I believe that Quick Response (QR) codes are useful.
column8: I use Quick Response (QR) codes frequently.
column9: I prefer to scan a Quick Response (QR) code over other alternatives.
column10: I would rather type a website link, or URL, than scan a Quick Response (QR) code.
column11: I remember events with QR codes more easily than those with website links (URLs).
